name: Judgement Night
description:
Story:

You wake up and find yourself in a strange dream and your mission is to uncover the dark secrets that it holds.

Settings:

Movement - WASD

Camera Movement - Mouse

Interact - E

You can change the Music Volume, Mouse Sensitivity and Fullscreen located in the Main Menu.

Developer Note:

This is The First Game I've ever made so don't expect too much, but hey I tried my best. It's a short game that shouldn't take too long to finish. This game took about 3 months to make because as i said this is the first game ive made, so i had to learn everything from scratch. I had to learn Blender, Unity, Sound Editing and Coding which i still suck at lmao. But hey it was a fun journey.
